text:
Tractor Sports Club (), commonly known as Tractor is an Iranian football club. It is based in Tabriz, East Azarbaijan. They play in the Persian Gulf Pro League.
They used to be known as Tractor Sazi.
Rivalries.
They are rivals of 3 Iranian teams, being Esteghlal F.C., Persepolis F.C., and Machine Sazi F.C..
